name: HILLSBOROUGH COMMUNITY COLLEGE
sampleDescriptions: Seeking federal funding for workforce training programs and facilities; Requesting changes in the Workforce Training Center system; monitoring regulatory changes to DOL apprenticeship programs.

Seeking federal funding for workforce development and training programs at ED, DOL, Commerce and NSF in FY2018 and FY2019 appropriations; Seeking support for Hispanic-Serving Institution (HSI) and TRI
Legislative activity and issues related to termination of the Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals (DACA) program; Enactment of legal protections for Dreamers

HEA Reauthorization for: the Perkins Loan program, Pell grant expansion, TAACT, Title III institutional aid, and inclusion of the Return of Title IV funds (R2T4) provision; Supporting HSI STEM program
Seeking federal funding for workforce training programs and facilities; Requesting changes in the Workforce Training Center system; monitoring regulatory changes to DOL apprenticeship programs.
